SEARCH
Module com.example.umlscd
Package com.example.umlscd.Models.ClassDiagram

Class ClassDiagramD

java.lang.Object
com.example.umlscd.Models.ClassDiagram.ClassDiagramD
public class ClassDiagramD extends Object

Class Diagram Representation

The ClassDiagramD class represents the entire UML Class Diagram within the UML Editor application. It encapsulates all the classes, interfaces, and relationships that constitute the diagram. This class serves as the core model that holds the structural information of the UML diagram, facilitating serialization and deserialization processes for saving and loading diagrams.

Key functionalities include:

  • Maintaining a list of UML classes.
  • Maintaining a list of UML interfaces.
  • Maintaining a list of UML relationships between classes and interfaces.
  • Providing getters and setters for each of the lists to allow easy access and modification.

Authors: Ahmad Wyne, Wahaj Asif, Muhammad Muneeb

Version: 1.0

Since: 2024-12-03

      public void setClasses(List<UMLClassBox> classes)
      Sets the list of UML classes in the diagram.

      This method replaces the current list of classes with the provided list.

      Parameters:
      classes - A List of UMLClassBox instances to set.
